thread.title: Japan: PlayStation 4 Falls Behind Wii U in Sales - newsR
thread.title_full: Japan: PlayStation 4 Falls Behind Wii U in Sales - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Japan: PlayStation 4 Falls Behind Wii U in Sales - newsR
text: The 3DS continues to be the best-selling piece of hardware on the Japanese market, but the big story of the week is that the PlayStation 4 has lost a lot of its sales in a short period of time and has dropped to fourth. The Nintendo handheld managed to move 26,739 units to its fans for the week that ended on September 20, which is only slightly down when compared to the previous week, according to Media Create figures Quote: d by Â»
